description:
Himeko`s friend and roommate, is an athletic girl, one of the best runners on the Ototachibana track team.
On the day Souma attacked Himeko, she was severely injured in the collapsing dormitory. Her competing in the Interhigh competitions was shot to pieces. She pushed Himeko away, possibly blaming her for the injuries, but more likely distraught over not being able to run anymore.
name: Saotome Makoto
